comment.author: 31716342@N00
comment._content: Could this be an LB-30 rather than a modified B-24?

comment.author: 18532986@N07
comment._content: This is XB-24B Liberator (s/n 39-680), that has been converted to a C-87 Liberator Express. It was originally ordered as XB-24 (s/n 39-556) but was modified as an XB-24B and reserialed 39-680. It was scrapped in Alabama in June 1946.
